00048 WaitForDnsSdServices::~WaitForDnsSdServices()
00049 {
00050     // Delete all search service
00051     SmartLocker SL_ThreadSafeSection(ThreadSafeSection);
00052 
00053     while( SearchServices.GetNumberOfElements() > 0 )
00054     {
00055         delete SearchServices.ExtractFirst();
00056     }
00057 }

00059 bool WaitForDnsSdServices::IsServiceLocked( const SimpleString ServiceName )
00060 {
00061     if ( ServiceName.IsEmpty() )
00062     {
00063         return false;
00064     }
00065 
00066     SimpleString ShortName = DnsSdService::GetDNSSDServiceNameFromFullName( ServiceName );
00067 
00068     SmartLocker SL_mutexServicesUsed(mutexServicesUsed);
00069 
00070     if ( ServicesUsed.IsDefined( ShortName ) )
00071     {
00072         // OmiscidTrace( "       '%s' is locked.\n", ServiceName.GetStr() );
00073         return true;
00074     }
00075 
00076     // OmiscidTrace( "   '%s' is not locked.\n", ServiceName.GetStr() );
00077     return false;
00078 }
00079 
00080 bool WaitForDnsSdServices::LockService( const SimpleString ServiceName )
00081 {
00082     if ( ServiceName.IsEmpty() )
00083     {
00084         return false;
00085     }
00086 
00087     SimpleString ShortName = DnsSdService::GetDNSSDServiceNameFromFullName( ServiceName );
00088 
00089     SmartLocker SL_mutexServicesUsed(mutexServicesUsed);
00090 
00091     if ( ServicesUsed.IsDefined( ShortName ) )
00092     {
00093         // OmiscidTrace( "Lock '%s' is already set.\n", ServiceName.GetStr() );
00094         return false;
00095     }
00096 
00097     ServicesUsed[ShortName] = SimpleString::EmptyString;        // identical to ServicesUsed[ServiceName] = NULL
00098     // OmiscidTrace( "Lock '%s' set.\n", ServiceName.GetStr() );
00099 
00100     return true;
00101 }
00102 
00103 void WaitForDnsSdServices::UnlockService( const SimpleString ServiceName )
00104 {
00105     if ( ServiceName.IsEmpty() )
00106     {
00107         return;
00108     }
00109 
00110     SimpleString ShortName = DnsSdService::GetDNSSDServiceNameFromFullName( ServiceName );
00111 
00112     SmartLocker SL_mutexServicesUsed(mutexServicesUsed);
00113 
00114     ServicesUsed.Undefine( ShortName );
00115 
00116     // OmiscidTrace( "Lock '%s' removed.\n", ServiceName.GetStr() );
00117     return;
00118 }

00120 void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE SearchService::DnsSdProxyServiceBrowseReply( unsigned int flags, const DnsSdService& CurrentService )
00121 {
00122     if ( flags & OmiscidDNSServiceFlagsAdd )
00123     {
00124         if ( IsResolved == true )
00125         {
00126             // Not me, I am already resolved...
00127             return;
00128         }
00129 
00130         // We do not need to make \032 modification...
00131         SimpleString FullName = CurrentService.CompleteServiceName;
00132 
00133         // If the search name == 0, we do check for every service, in all other case, we compare
00134         // The search name with the current service
00135         if ( SearchName.IsEmpty() || strncasecmp( (char*)SearchName.GetStr(), (char*)FullName.GetStr(), SearchName.GetLength() ) == 0 )
00136         {
00137             // Do we already consider this service ?
00138             if ( Parent->IsServiceLocked(FullName) )
00139             {
00140                 // yes, so exit
00141                 return;
00142             }
00143 
00144             // Call the callback
00145             if ( CallBack )
00146             {
00147                 if ( CallBack( FullName, CurrentService.HostName, CurrentService.Port,
00148                     (uint16_t)CurrentService.Properties.GetTXTRecordLength(), (const char*)CurrentService.Properties.ExportTXTRecord(),
00149                     UserData) == false )
00150                 {
00151                     return;
00152                 }
00153             }
00154 
00155             // We lock the full service Name to prevent multiple use of the same instance
00156             // of a service...
00157             if ( Parent->LockService( FullName ) == false )
00158             {
00159                 // already used...
00160                 return;
00161             }
00162 
00163             // Fill the service informations
00164             Init( FullName, CurrentService.Port, CurrentService.HostName );
00165             Properties = CurrentService.Properties;
00166             IsResolved = true;
00167 
00168             ++Parent->NbServicesReady;
00169         }
00170     }
00171     else
00172     {
00173         // remove a service
00174         if ( IsResolved == true )
00175         {
00176             // Maybe me, I am already resolved...
00177             if ( CurrentService.Name == Name )
00178             {
00179                 // Empty my DnsSdService part
00180                 Empty();
00181 
00182                 // Let's say I am not resolve anymore
00183                 IsResolved = false;
00184                 --Parent->NbServicesReady;
00185             }
00186         }
00187     }
00188 }

00190 bool SearchService::StartSearch( const SimpleString eName, const SimpleString eRegType, WaitForDnsSdServices * eParent, IsServiceValidForMe eCallBack, void * eUserData )
00191 {
00192     if ( eParent == (WaitForDnsSdServices *)NULL || (!eName.IsEmpty() && DnsSdService::CheckName( eName ) == false) )
00193     {
00194         return false;
00195     }
00196 
00197     // Length of eNAme is checked by DnsSdService::CheckName
00198     SearchName = eName;
00199 
00200     // we must at least put a name or give a callback
00201     // in all other case, we can not choose a service !
00202     if ( SearchName.GetLength() == 0 && eCallBack == NULL )
00203     {
00204         return false;
00205     }
00206 
00207     // Set internal members
00208     Parent = eParent;
00209     CallBack = eCallBack;
00210     UserData = eUserData;
00211 
00212     // Everything is ready, return if we can start browse
00213     return StartBrowse();
00214 }
00215 
00216 void SearchService::StopSearch()
00217 {
00218     StopBrowse();
00219 }

00221 int WaitForDnsSdServices::NeedService( const SimpleString eName, const SimpleString eRegType, IsServiceValidForMe eCallBack, void * eUserData )
00222 {
00223     int PosOfNewSearchService;
00224     SearchService * pNewSearchService = new OMISCID_TLM SearchService;
00225 
00226     SmartLocker SL_ThreadSafeSection(ThreadSafeSection);
00227 
00228     if ( pNewSearchService == NULL )
00229     {
00230         return -1;
00231     }
00232 
00233     if ( pNewSearchService->StartSearch( eName, eRegType, this, eCallBack, eUserData ) == false )
00234     {
00235         // Could not start search, destroy search service
00236         delete pNewSearchService;
00237         return -1;
00238     }
00239 
00240     // Everything fine, so add it to my search list
00241     SearchServices.Add(pNewSearchService);
00242 
00243     // compute virtual position of service
00244     PosOfNewSearchService = SearchServices.GetNumberOfElements() - 1;
00245 
00246     return PosOfNewSearchService; // Information about the service pos in the table
00247 }
00248 
00249 void WaitForDnsSdServices::StopWaiting()
00250 {
00251     int i;
00252 
00253     SmartLocker SL_ThreadSafeSection(ThreadSafeSection);
00254     for( i = 0; i < GetNbOfSearchedServices(); i++ )
00255     {
00256         // stop the current i-th OmiscidServiceSearchData
00257         this->operator[](i).StopSearch();
00258     }
00259 }
00260 
00261 bool WaitForDnsSdServices::WaitAll( unsigned int DelayMax )
00262 {
00263     bool Done;
00264 
00265     SmartLocker SL_ThreadSafeSection(ThreadSafeSection, false);
00266 
00267     if ( DelayMax == 0 )
00268     {
00269         // INFINITE wait
00270         Done = false;
00271         while( Done == false ) // was for(;;) but new version of MS compiler do no like it
00272         {
00273             // Is the work done ?
00274             SL_ThreadSafeSection.Lock();
00275 
00276             int NbReady = NbServicesReady;
00277             Done = (NbReady == (int)SearchServices.GetNumberOfElements());
00278 
00279             if ( Done == true )
00280             {
00281                 // We ask our thread to stop to wait for services
00282                 StopWaiting();
00283                 SL_ThreadSafeSection.Unlock();
00284                 return true;
00285             }
00286             // We wait longer
00287             SL_ThreadSafeSection.Unlock();
00288 
00289             // Wait
00290             Thread::Sleep( 10 );
00291         }
00292         // never here
00293         return true;
00294     }
00295     else
00296     {
00297         ElapsedTime CountWaitedTime;
00298         Done = false;
00299         while( Done == false ) // was for(;;) but new version of MS compiler do no like it
00300         {
00301             // Is the work done ?
00302             SL_ThreadSafeSection.Lock();
00303             Done = NbServicesReady == (int)SearchServices.GetNumberOfElements();
00304 
00305 
00306             if ( Done == true || CountWaitedTime.Get() >= DelayMax )
00307             {
00308                 // We ask our thread to stop to wait for services
00309                 StopWaiting();
00310                 SL_ThreadSafeSection.Unlock();
00311                 return Done;
00312             }
00313 
00314             // We wait longer
00315             SL_ThreadSafeSection.Unlock();
00316 
00317             Thread::Sleep( 10 );
00318         }
00319         // never here
00320         return true;
00321     }
00322 }
00323 
00324 int WaitForDnsSdServices::GetNbOfSearchedServices()
00325 {
00326     int res;
00327 
00328     SmartLocker SL_ThreadSafeSection(ThreadSafeSection);
00329 
00330     res = (int)SearchServices.GetNumberOfElements();
00331 
00332     return res;
00333 }
00334 
00335 SearchService & WaitForDnsSdServices::operator[](int nPos)
00336 {
00337     int i;
00338     SearchService * pSearchService = NULL;
00339 
00340     SmartLocker SL_ThreadSafeSection(ThreadSafeSection);
00341 
00342     if ( nPos < 0 || nPos >= (int)SearchServices.GetNumberOfElements() )
00343     {
00344         throw ServiceException( "Out of band" ) ;
00345     }
00346 
00347     // Search in the list and return the value
00348     for( i = 0, SearchServices.First(); SearchServices.NotAtEnd(); i++, SearchServices.Next() )
00349     {
00350         if ( i == nPos )
00351         {
00352             pSearchService = SearchServices.GetCurrent();
00353         }
00354     }
00355 
00356     return *pSearchService;
00357 }
00358 
00359 bool SearchService::IsAvailable()
00360 {
00361     return (IsResolved == false);
00362 }
